name: HELL OF VERDUN
description:
In HELL OF VERDUN is set in World War I in 1916, thousands of soldiers had already fallen. As a German soldier, Hanz Meier, you are there. Your troops should attack the French fort near Verdun.But everything will be different, the attack will not take place, but a whole new hell will arise. In HELL OF VERDUN, explore the trenches surrounding the Battle of Verdun.

Explore the horrors of the First World War and uncover its dark secrets

Terrible War.

THIS IS AN ALPHA VERSION. Im Looking for Feedback from you.
